description: The Paystack Model Context Protocol (MCP) server allows AI agents to interact with Paystack through standardized MCP clients via tool calling. This protocol supports various tools to interact with different Paystack services.

paystackSecretKey.description: Your Paystack secret key for API access

capabilities.name: create_product
capabilities.description: Create a new product on your Paystack integration

capabilities.name: list_products
capabilities.description: List products available on your Paystack integration with pagination support

capabilities.name: get_product
capabilities.description: Get details of a specific product by ID

capabilities.name: update_product
capabilities.description: Update an existing product by ID

capabilities.name: create_customer
capabilities.description: Create a new customer in Paystack

capabilities.name: list_customers
capabilities.description: List customers available on your Paystack integration

capabilities.name: get_customer
capabilities.description: Get details of a specific customer by email or code

capabilities.name: update_customer
capabilities.description: Update a customer's details

capabilities.name: validate_customer
capabilities.description: Validate a customer's identity with bank account

capabilities.name: set_customer_risk_action
capabilities.description: Whitelist or blacklist a customer

capabilities.name: deactivate_authorization
capabilities.description: Deactivate a payment authorization when a card needs to be forgotten

capabilities.name: initialize_transaction
capabilities.description: Initialize a transaction to accept payment on Paystack

capabilities.name: verify_transaction

capabilities.name: list_transactions

capabilities.name: transaction_totals

capabilities.name: list_states
